trans-unit.resname: OMIC·1 | Leinore, Autumn Sovereign | Card Name
OMIC·1 | Leinore, Autumn Sovereign | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Coven — At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control. Then if you control three or more creatures with different powers, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: Coven — At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control. Then if you control three or more creatures with different powers, draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: OMIC·1 | Leinore, Autumn Sovereign | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She keeps the festival's revels from faltering, infusing the witches' rituals with hope.
trans-unit.target: She keeps the festival's revels from faltering, infusing the witches' rituals with hope.

trans-unit.resname: OMIC·2 | Wilhelt, the Rotcleaver | Card Name
OMIC·2 | Wilhelt, the Rotcleaver | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever another Zombie you control dies, if it didn't have decayed, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a Zombie. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: Whenever another Zombie you control dies, if it didn't have decayed, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a Zombie. If you do, draw a card.
